title: Couple With Heart Man Person Light Skin Tone Medium Dark Skin Tone
description: Depicts a kissing couple, specifically a person and a man, with a heart above them. This variation indicates the skin tones of the individuals. It conveys passionate love, intimacy, and a romantic connection.
apple_vendor_description: This joyful emoji, depicting a couple with a heart and rendered with a light skin tone for the man and a medium-dark skin tone for the person, radiates warmth and connection on Apple devices. Apple's characteristic 3D shading and smooth gradients create a harmonious blend of skin tones, with the central heart glowing with a soft, romantic luminescence. The gentle embrace and the shared heart, brought to life with realistic lighting and soft, rounded edges, symbolize unity, love, and a beautiful partnership, making it ideal for celebrating relationships.
